snippet.title: Pizzapocalypse - [3D PLATFORMER TRAILER]
snippet.description:
As a pizza chef, master your pizza toolset to traverse a corporation-ridden city and make a delivery to those in need. Pizzapocalypse is a 3D Platformer made by eighteen Year 2 students, in around twelve weeks of dedicated development.

Play for free on Itch!
https://buas.itch.io/pizzapocalypse
